_header: Knight in travail for to serve
_description: ‘A pure balade of love’: the glamour of a knight errant — six couplets

CamGon176.First Lines:
Knyȝtes in travayle for to serveWher of the may thanke
                    deserve…
CamGon176.Last Lines:
…Vaillant viallant Lo where he goithAnd then he gyvith hym
                    gold & cloth
CamGon176.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 38.
